message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV. 

The paper deals with information retrieval algorithms and text passages, which are typical topics in the sub-category of Information Retrieval (cs.IR). The paper also focuses on cross-lingual document retrieval (CLDR), which is a subfield of Natural Language Processing (NLP) and falls under the sub-category of Computational Linguistics (cs.CL). The use of regularization and term-weighting schemes suggests that the paper may also belong to the sub-categories of Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper evaluates its proposed methods on eight CLDR problems, which may involve the use of image-based retrieval techniques, making the paper relevant to the sub-category of Computer Vision (cs.CV).
